Canadian release of "Titanic" sank centennial co

The Royal Canadian Mint announced that it will issue a silver coin to commemorate the sinking of the Titanic ", the 100th anniversary of the 5th.
ralph lauren
While this front by the artist Yves Beilu Bu design of the coin: "Titanic" is in full swing and rushed to the tip of the ship with the standard iceberg between the latitude and longitude of specific sank in the North Atlantic.
polo ralph lauren
Royal Canadian Mint, said, While silver containing 99.99% silver, plus $ 10 each (the Canadian dollar was slightly higher than U.S. dollars), priced at $ 64.95 plus issued a total of 20000.
www.polo-ralphlaurens.net
The Mint also cast 50 silver and 25 copper-nickel coin, to commemorate the tragedy, the price of34.95 and 25.95, respectively.
GHD
Senator Stephen Green said in a statement, the tragic fate for a long time since Titanic Titanic" has been the whole world appeals to the imagination," Titanic "in the navigation process of 100 years ago led to many people sacrifice a lot of painful lessons, these beautifully crafted coins expression to commemorate this historic event.
Lisseur Ghd
It is known that the British Royal Mint has produced coins to commemorate the disaster.

"Titanic" sank in the North Atlantic on April 15, 1912, resulting in 1,500 deaths, 700 survivors. www.lisseurghdfrance.net

London regulations passengers litter owner is liable to a fi

London, UK from the end of March, the implementation of a new legislation, if the passengers toward the car outside the litter, the owner will be fined 100 pounds (about $ 158) fine. Britain's environment secretary, Caroline Spelman, I hope that this new provision to the whole United Kingdom.
ralph lauren
In the UK, littering is illegal. If the defendant in court because of littering will face a maximum fine of £ 2,500 (3950 dollars).
polo ralph lauren
London the first of its kind, will give the owners liable passengers violations. Start from the end of this month, in accordance with the provisions of the interior towards the exterior, throwing garbage, regardless of the owners is whether drivers will be punishable by a fine of £ 100 ($ 158).
www.polo-ralphlaurens.net
Arresting motorists and passengers littering behavior is a problem. It is reported that the CCTV system may be "joined" law enforcement, to help implement this legislation.
GHD
Spelman said at the summit: "We know that to confirm the identity of the offenders may form an additional challenge, which is our intention to observe the reasons for London implementation of the information obtained by the British media."
Lisseur Ghd
Keep Britain tidy group's findings show that 23% of motorists admit readily the garbage thrown out the window, "because they feel that they will not be seen will not be caught". www.lisseurghdfrance.net

Forbes magazine concluded that the billionaires in common: V

Study of 657 self-made super-rich, "Forbes" magazine summed up the eight common characteristics of billionaires, however, the scientific nature of this study is very debatable.
ralph lauren
Parents Mathematics great

Forbes magazine billionaire, a considerable part of the parents has a high mathematical talent, and mathematics can be genetic.
polo ralph lauren
The most common among the occupations in the super-rich parents, engineers, accountants and small business owners. For example, Bill Gates's father is one of the founders of the U.S. 10 Business Law Firm, as early as the seventies of last century to become a millionaire, Gates's mother is the Director of the Bank.
www.polo-ralphlaurens.net
Second, the September birth maximum

Another interesting phenomenon is born in the autumn of U.S. billionaires than any other season is born. In the Forbes Global list of the richest 380 self-made American billionaires, 42 were born in September. At the same time, born in December, U.S. billionaire relatively much less.

Dropped out of college after the venture

Among 380 self-made billionaires, more than 20 percent of people who never went to college or did not finish college. This is especially notable among those destined to become technology entrepreneurs, billionaire,. The most famous of which Bill Gates, Steve Jobs, Michael Dell, Larry Ellison, Xiaoduoer Wayi Te and Mark Zuckerberg.
GHD
Fourth, graduated from top business schools

The financial industry billionaire is one of the highest educational groups: over 55% of people with graduate degrees. Of these, nearly 90 percent of the MBA graduate of Harvard University, Columbia University or the University of Pennsylvania Wharton School of Business. Energy investor George Kaiser and hedge fund magnate Ken Griffin, has a Harvard MBA and both the billionaire.
Lisseur Ghd
Fifth, worked at Goldman Sachs

In the U.S. financial industry billionaire, at least 11 early career was spent at Goldman Sachs. Among them, the most famous Edward Lambert, David Tepper, Daniel Oak, Tom Steele and Richard Perry.

By adding the mysterious Skull and Bones

"Skull and Bones at Yale University, is the seat of America's most mysterious and most powerful Alumni Association" Skull and Bones ". Current and former billionaires have to Skull and Bones membership Yale University academic. The billionaire has joined the "Skull and Bones" including investment big Henglanbote, Blackstone co-founder Schwarzman, etc..
www.lisseurghdfrance.net
Seven, was "very hurt"

There are several hundreds of millions of rich early in his career dogged suffering setbacks. The pharmaceutical industry Heng Keke's first business venture eventually failed, for this experience, he felt regret but also grateful. Kirk as early as in 2007, Forbes magazine said: "early failure, though not sufficient condition, but it is a necessary condition."

8 in Bath investment bank work

The Bass brothers in the eighties of the last century to become the holy places of the young genius investors. The private equity giant, David Bonderman and Jim Kurt have in the effectiveness of the investment department of the Bass family.

In the Bass brothers, the billionaire real estate mogul Tom Barak.

Scientists have discovered a "super-Earth" or ha

ralph lauren U.S. scientists found a "super Earth" place of the 40 light-years from Earth, with a lot of water vapor, the water content more than the Earth. The scientists speculate that there millions of years ago may nurture life.
polo ralph lauren
Harvard - Smithsonian Astrophysical Center (Harvard-Smithsonian Center for Astrophysics) of astronomers using the Hubble Space Telescope in 2009 found that this "super Earth", and named GJ1214b. Now can confirm that the planet is a "water world", surrounded by the thick layer of water vapor. Astronomer Zach Leibel tower(ZachoryBerta,), said: "GJ1214b known planet with us are different, its mostly made of water." Scientists have speculated that the planet millions of years ago may nurture life.
GHD
GJ1214b the diameter is 2.7 times that of Earth, but the quality is seven times that of the Earth. It revolves around a red dwarf star rotation, from the distance of the red dwarf star70 times the distance between the Earth and the Sun, it is estimated that the temperature above 232 degrees Celsius. Be estimated on the of GJ1214b quality volume and density, the researchers believe that the amount of water on it to contain more than the Earth but less rock. Bertha said, of GJ1214b the internal structure may be completely different with the Earth, the high temperature and pressure may allow where the formation of many different substances, such as hot ice or super fluid water. "
Lisseur Ghd
Astronomers Heather Cooper (Heather Couper) These findings are very excited about. He said: "There is abundant evidence that there is water on that planet. This proves the presence of water in the universe is very common, this is the most exciting thing. Cosmologists Mark Birkinshaw think of the University of Bristol, on the planet once the existence of life, and perhaps still lives. www.lisseurghdfrance.net

Canadian shale beds found the earliest known human ancestor

The Pikaia gracilens found in a quarry in Canada's Yoho National Park Burgess Shale fossil. They are the oldest known chordate, survival dating back 505 million years ago.
ralph lauren
Canadian shale found the fossils of prehistoric animals of a shape like the eel, by scientists as the oldest known human ancestor. Such animals are called "Pikaia gracilens", a length of 5 cm, can glide to survive dating back 505 million years ago, is the oldest life forms of the original spinal cord.
polo ralph lauren
The Pikaia gracilens vertebrate ancestors, but also including the immediate ancestor of all chordates, including fish, birds, reptiles, amphibians and mammals. Save the Pikaia gracilens wreckage fossils are found in the Canadian shale. About 100 years ago, the American paleontologist Charles Duri ter Val Cote d'discovered the fossils. He believes that animals should be in the fossil is an early form of leeches or earthworms.
www.polo-ralphlaurens.net
As the Pikaia gracilens it seems a long primitive notochord, scientists believe they should be a chordate. (Notochord is a flexible rod-shaped structure, constitutes the spine of vertebrates.), However, did not grow fully mature spine, Pikaia gracilens should be classified in which a species is still unknown.
GHD
University of Cambridge, UK and Canadian scientists on 114 samples were analyzed, and eventually found the skeletal muscle tissue called the sarcomere. This finding can eliminate some of the scientists the Pikaia gracilens is the most primitive chordates suspicion of this conclusion. Simon Conway Morris, lead author of the research paper said: "The sarcomere is our long been looking for evidence. The sarcomere nerve cord, notochord, and vascular system found Pikaia is the most primitive chordates on Earth."research papers published in the journal of the Review of Biology.
Lisseur Ghd
Co-author Sean - Bernard Cullen said jokingly: learned Swan snake Bear zebra and human exist with this tiny animal blood relationship, I feel humiliated. "The researchers pointed out that the the Pikaia gracilens body flat shape like eel muscle was nodular, axonal almost throughout the whole body. Their head is small, with two tentacles, they are also long a thin dorsal fin, but no eyes. The Pikaia gracilens once on the seabed and the winding road, twisting the body forward. www.lisseurghdfrance.net

The Queen of England ascended the throne the 60th anniversar

Domestic tour of the diamond celebration of the 60th anniversary of Britain's Queen Elizabeth II ascended the throne on the 8th in Leicester to start Kate Princess accompanying.
ralph lauren
Reported that the Queen and his party to take the train arrived in Leicester, local people waving the British flag at the station and on the streets to welcome cheers. The Diamond celebration of the country visits will last four months.
polo ralph lauren
Her Majesty the Queen on his way to De Montfort University, pause to watch a cultural dance performances in the De Montfort Square. The royal fleet to De Montfort University, the Queen and his party first enter the University's Hugh - Aston Tower visit to show the number of exhibitions of local projects and charitable activities.
www.polo-ralphlaurens.net
After the Queen and Kate Princess together to watch the student fashion show. Six students to participate in fashion show to show Kate their own personally designed shoes.
GHD
The occasion of the Queen and Kate watch the fashion show, Prince Philip visited the De Montfort University to help improve the life of local communities and the surrounding environment of the project.
Lisseur Ghd
The end of the British royal family and his party in the University's activities to Leicester Catholic Church to participate in prayer. They went to Saint Martins Building, with local religious leaders and charitable organizations met with representatives. Saint Martin hall of the building after lunch, the Queen line to Leicester city center, bell tower tour and accept the souvenirs of the city sent.
www.lisseurghdfrance.net
The Queen and Prince Philip from the Isle of Wight, England, south to north in the diamond celebration tour of area, the other also includes Mercer Tydfil, Wales and Scotland in Edinburgh and Glasgow.

They will in the period from March to July by car, the Royal train, airplane and boat the way these different places tour. Her Majesty the Queen and Prince Philip will be held July 25 at the end of the South East of England ascended the throne 60 years of tour of the country visits

English institutions survey said 98% of the human and goril

ralph lauren New one of the British magazine Nature published the paper said, Sanger Institute, UK and other institutional researchers gorilla genome sequencing, analysis showed that the degree of similarity with the human genome, 98% in the evolutionary tree, the separation of the two time in about 10 million years ago.
polo ralph lauren
This achievement marks the scientific community to complete the biological classification of "human subjects", including humans, all four genome sequencing. In taxonomy, the man belongs to the Primates Hominidae, genus Chi race. Analysis showed that the separation of the earliest and Human orangutans, isolated in about 14 million years ago, about 97% of the genome and human similarity; followed by the gorilla separated about 10 million years ago, about the Genome and the human similarity 98%;latest separation chimpanzees, the time at about 600 million years ago, its genome with the most similar to human, the similarity of up to 99%.
www.polo-ralphlaurens.net
One of the authors, the Sanger Institute Dr. Xue Yali said, this study not only help clarify the above-mentioned human evolutionary history, but also found some other depth research value. For example, people think that long-term evolution of the hearing is inextricably linked with human-specific language behavior, but this study found that gorillas and hearing-related genes experience similar to the speed of evolution and human, but the gorillas can not speak, so the hearing gene behind the evolutionary driving force may need to rethink.
GHD
Another point is that there is a gene in the genome of humans and gorillas, but the people of this gene have a higher risk of heart disease, gorillas, although this gene, but no such risk of heart disease. If you clear this difference can explore the reasons behind it would help promote heart disease-related medical research.
Lisseur Ghd
Gorillas are the largest extant primates, which live in the jungles of the tropical areas of Africa, gorillas of different regions can be divided into several subspecies. The sequencing is one called "Camilla" female western lowland gorilla. www.lisseurghdfrance.net

Formal coaching change Locke, U.S. Pacific Command, Montreal

U.S. Pacific Command is responsible for the Asia-Pacific military affairs on the 9thcoaching change took office, to succeed the incumbent retired after 39 years of service Robert Willard, commander, Admiral Samuel Locke Montreal.
ralph lauren
Both the handover ceremony was held the day in the U.S. Pacific Command headquarters in Hawaii, U.S. Defense Secretary Panetta and the U.S. Joint Chiefs of main Xidengpuxi the scene, personally presided over the handover ceremony.
polo ralph lauren
Willard's experience is similar to the 57-year-old Locke Montreal, started from the Navy, and later was promoted to commander of the U.S. Navy stationed in Europe and Africa all the way. March last year, the U.S. join forces to NATO's attack on Libya, he was responsible for command of coalition forces to set up no-fly zone, Chan set an illustrious military exploits.
www.polo-ralphlaurens.net
Late last year, Locke Montreal President Barack Obama nominated the commander of U.S. Pacific Command. As the largest U.S. Command, Pacific Command, more than320,000 troops, the area of responsibility from the U.S. West Coast until India and Pakistan, the dividing line across the Asia-Pacific and Indian Ocean regions.
GHD
Under the jurisdiction of military affairs in the Pacific Command, the military relations between China and the United States can be described as a top priority. Locke Montreal last month to attend the hearing of the Senate nomination, he said, although the two sides that differences exist, he took office will do its utmost to improve Sino-US military relations, but urged China to increase military transparency.
Lisseur Ghd
U.S. military movements in the Asia-Pacific region of concern. In January this year, the U.S. announced a new national defense strategy, express towards the end of the war in Iraq and Afghanistan, the United States will turn in the Asia-Pacific region to strengthen its military deployment to maintain and consolidate its influence in the region.
www.lisseurghdfrance.net
According to the plan, since the middle of this year, the U.S. will Australia take turns stationing hundreds of Marines soldiers, and the troop increase to 2,500 in the next seven years, In addition, the U.S. military also plans deployment of coastal warships in Singapore and interest in strengthening military cooperation with the Philippines

Paris plans to build 320 meters of the twin towers will beco

Paris, France plans to start construction in the near future called "Abbey Plaza Tower, Petronas Twin Towers, after the completion of the height of 320 meters, than London, England in the construction debris buildings above 10 meters, and then to become the tallest building in Europe matter.
ralph lauren
It is reported that the twin towers in Paris by the British Foster partners construction company design, and its developer is a private enterprise in Russia Abbey Group. The group's CEO leaves Eastman Kender Lavrov announced on the 9th, the construction plan of the Abbey Square tower "has passed the examination and approval of relevant departments in Paris, and finalized in the famous Parisian business district La Défense settled . The Group will be the beginning of this month to clean the construction area, and started construction at the end of this year or early next year, the Twin Towers is expected to formally put into commercial operation in 2017.
polo ralph laurens
"This project construction cost of approximately € 2 billion, of which 700 million euros from bank borrowings, € 300 million will be paid by the Group. Remaining construction funds will be to raise the sale of the tower apartments and office area," said Ye Ming, "built After the twin towers will be equipped with a multi-functional area of 280,000 square meters, 35,000 square meters of office space, 50,000 square meters of retail dining areas, 543 apartment suites, and a 5-star luxury hotel in May this year , we will officially announce the final selection of hotel operators. "
www.polo-ralphlaurens.net
Despite the world financial crisis of 2008, Paris real estate market has been in the doldrums, many real estate sales prices are still below the 2007 level, but the Abbey Group, the sales prospects of the twin towers project is very confident. Ye Ming said: "We are the twin tower apartment starting price set at around € 12,000 per square meter, the Paris region since 2008, house prices rose by 40%, the city's high-end apartment prices 10000 euros to 35,000 euros, so we think the price of the tower apartment, there is still much room for growth. "
GHD
In addition, Ye Ming, also pointed out that the office area of the project is likely a one-time sale to a customer, the specific details of the transaction is expected to be determined this summer. In addition to the twin tower project, the Abbey Group has also invested to set up a real estate development and management company to help other Russian or Middle Eastern companies to land purchase real estate in Paris.
Lisseur Ghd
At present, Europe's tallest building in London, England under construction debris Building, built height of 310 meters. The world's tallest building is up to 828 meters in the United Arab Emirates Burj Dubai. www.lisseurghdfrance.net

Hawking guest "Big Bang" is not the first time,

ralph lauren In the hit U.S. drama "Big Bang" otaku "thank ears" and finally equal skill, the renowned theoretical physicist Stephen Hawking is about to guest "Big Bang" and "thank ears blows, the set will be time broadcast on April 5.
www.polo-ralphlaurens.net

Reported that Xie ears and Hawking have jointly filmed a scene, the two seems a big fight. "A message, so that the ears of fans of a lot to thank very much look forward. Today, the American TV fans finally understood why the original is Hawking.
Lisseur Ghd
Of course, Hawking has more than this time, "electric shock" after "Star Trek: The Next Generation", Stephen Hawking to the identity of their own real life, and Einstein, Newton and other scientists in the enterprise No. "playing bridge, and his figure also appeared in" The Simpsons "and" Futurama ".
www.lisseurghdfrance.net

Interview with Le Figaro, France Institute Academician accus

The French "Le Figaro" published in the 8th Supplement 12 of the French Academy, a" time" as the theme of the interview, accompanied by a series of luxury brand watches, advertising. A number of French media reported that the surveyed 12 per capita has no knowledge of.
ralph lauren
French media quoted a communique issued on the 8th by the College de France, said the College de France "solemn protest" injury "Le Figaro" this conduct of its members. Lifelong Secretary-General of former President Valery Giscard d'Estaing, the College de France, Elena when Kos and former health minister Simone Weil and other interview academicians did not expect the "Le Figaro" will be the interview for ads.
polo ralph laurens
College de France, a total of 40 academicians places, Academician for life, enjoying the reputation of the "immortal". Only after the death of an academician, the other candidates are eligible to enter this after voting for the highest temple of the French language and culture.
www.polo-ralphlaurens.net
"Le Figaro" published a supplement to the photos of former French President Valery Giscard d'Estaing as the version of the first photos faintly visible in the upper-right corner of indoor display clock, and under the photo the Bo Lais hi watch ad echoes. Paper, each academician answered three of the same problem: "You have time to maintain what kind of relationship?" This relationship changed since you become 'immortal'? "" How you to know the time? "
GHD
"Le Figaro" in this issue of supplements, accompanied by a large number of luxury brand watches, advertising, and is suspected of publicity for the day of the opening of Basel, Switzerland, the International Watch and Jewellery Fair. Among them, the French writer fee on behalf of Rick dimensional map without fortification answer the same purpose, Howley slogan middle of the "Le Figaro" play into the hands. Dimensional diagram to answer the third question: the mechanical watch to tell you the time, the electronic table to sell you time. "
Lisseur Ghd
"Le Figaro" said, deeply regret this misunderstanding ", saying" Le Figaro "supplements are not advertising publications." College de France plays an important role in the cultural life of the Frenchman, "Le Figaro, "I hope that instead of continuing to maintain a relationship of mutual trust." www.lisseurghdfrance.net

Putin does not care about Obama to congratulate late

The official website of the Russian Prime Minister released a news that U.S. President Barack Obama take the initiative to call Putin the day, congratulations to Vladimir Putin in the presidential election victory. Ushakov, Putin's foreign affairs assistant, former ambassador to the United States revealed that the telephone conversation is informal, very rich, a total of 20 minutes.
ralph lauren
Ushakov, said the call, Obama wants US-Russian bilateral relations in recent years has been a positive trend has been further strengthened, and made clear their willingness To do this in close cooperation with Russian President-elect. Putin expressed his thanks at the same time that Russian-US relations have made significant progress, and stressed that the Russian-US cooperation to safeguard world security is of great significance, especially in the current volatile situation in this sense is particularly prominent.
polo ralph laurens
Ushakov also said in a telephone conversation, both sides expressed their willingness to Russia and the United States top-level meeting held in the near future, and stressed that before the formal meeting of the two to keep in touch. Obama pointed out, must be kept before the meeting of two presidents, assistant and expert-level contacts in order to better preparation for this meeting. Obama says it hopes to expand bilateral contacts with the Russian president-elect, especially the exchanges in the economic field and international issues.
www.polo-ralphlaurens.net
The reporter noted, is worth pondering is that Putin and Obama have pointed out that in this call during the campaign between the two countries have had sharp criticism of each other's words and deeds, but only a fierce campaign of a practice and shall not affect the rapid development of Russian-US relations. Putin on the phone also particularly wish Obama to win the U.S. presidential campaign, Obama expressed his thanks.
GHD
Carefully to find In fact, when Russia selected Commission announced on March 5 the statistical results of more than 99 percent of the vote, Putin had clinches win the presidential election. Subsequently, the message from the leaders, a congratulatory letter after another. Americans Putin was elected position was "not lukewarm not fire, leisurely". On the 5th, has been "particularly concerned about the Russian election, the U.S. State Department issued a statement saying the United States is ready to cooperate with the Russian president-elect ready, but this statement makes no mention of Putin. The statement only Once the voting results was confirmed, was elected president sworn in, the United States looks forward to cooperate with, put an "love ride ignore" look. Statement also apparent seriousness, said: "Russia's presidential election to partisan use of government resources as well as election day violations of procedural misconduct, the Russian government should have launched an independent, credible investigation until after the Russian official election final results, the United States Secretary of State Hillary Clinton was "shy" to say that America is willing to cooperate with the elected Russian President Vladimir Putin.
Lisseur Ghd
In Russia selected Committee, announced on March 7 the statistical results showed that 100 percent of the vote Putin to win two days after Obama called Putin congratulated. This is a "belated" congratulations, it seems, is "no alternative" to congratulate the Russian media on this ridicule Obama is "the last to congratulate Putin was elected a foreign head of state". However, Russia has a proverb: better late than never. Interestingly, Putin actually wish in their own candidates, who do everything possible to "trouble" Obama re-election success, and pledged its agreed to strengthen contacts.

Analysts here pointed out, open a "new chapter" of the two personal relationship through this "informal talk", Obama and Putin. Obama the U.S. president took office in January 20, 2009, Putin has to finish eight years of President and then became the Russian Prime Minister. Therefore, since the White House after Obama has been mainly dealing and maple combination of President Medvedev, President Putin has yet to truly play against.
www.lisseurghdfrance.net
Perhaps not quite understand, perhaps because too understanding, and open evaluation of the Obama Putin has been very kind. For example, on July 2, 2009, the Obama media reporters before the first visit to Russia soon met with Putin publicly said that Putin is "deep into the Cold War affect", which he described Putin one foot in the old routine, one foot in the new way ", said Putin's" need to look ahead. Putin immediately retorted: "We will not split a large fork only firmly upright, we always look forward, this is the characteristics of Russia, which has been promoting the power of Russia's forward."

With Putin's return to the Kremlin, Obama had to bite the bullet and direct exchanges with Putin, Obama is not a small test. From Putin's position in the call can be seen, older Obama, 11-year-old Putin is not with Obama care about those who can not get on the table a little trick, but behave very generous calm . To this end, Obama specifically said in the call, hope the G-8 Summit held in May this year at Camp David in honor of Vladimir Putin.

According to Russia's "Kommersant" on March 11 quoted sources as saying the White House, Putin can not refuse the invitation of Obama, the U.S. government learned that Putin was elected Russian president's final message, a resolute decision this year G-8 summit held by the Chicago diverted to Camp David. Previously, in order to save costs, the United States originally planned NATO summit and the G8 summit in May this year in Chicago, with sets of open, but because of the serious differences of views of Russia and the United States on the ABM issue, the Russian president has yet to indicate whether they attend in the North about during the summit held in Russia - NATO summit. "

Analysts here pointed out, objectively speaking, Putin re-return to the Kremlin, whether they are internal affairs or foreign policy are not "radical changes" will maintain its continuity, steady adjustments and changes. On the diplomatic front, Putin will be more pragmatic. In fact, Putin has never been anti-Westernism, a lot of media that Putin is anti-Western, anti-Americanism, it was not Putin's true thoughts, the United States and Europe media, intentionally or unintentionally misread Putin.

The first eight years of President Vladimir Putin, he has been committed to improve the relationship between Russia and the United States and Western countries, Russia and the Western world on the basis of equality to establish mutual trust. "9.11", Putin's response quickly, the first one had a telephone conversation with the then U.S. President George W. Bush expressed support for the United States. Putin's sincerity and did not return for the equality of the United States and the Western world, this had Putin criticized the United States is "Comrade wolf," the famous Munich speech in March 2007.

After assumption of the Russian President, Dmitry Medvedev, maple combination "Medvedev" good karma "in the Western politicians and media, outstretched to catch Obama" olive branch "successfully" reboot "due in 2008 grid-Russia conflict in August "crash" of Russian-US relations, the Russian-US relations with a trough.

Now, Putin's return to the general trend has been fixed. Regardless of the future president of the United States, Putin has been successfully elected as the President of Russia in the next six years. If Obama can re-election, then Obama will only deal with Putin the.

Analysts pointed out that Obama take the initiative to Putin phone is not the protocol on the "muddle through", but after careful consideration of prudence. Because, if the first few months of Obama on the sidelines Putin the Russian presidential election, then a few months after Putin on the sidelines, Obama to participate in the U.S. presidential campaign. Domestic election dust settles, Putin compared with an uncertain future in the next general election Barack Obama, of course, Putin is more calm, Obama is more disturbed.

For the successful re-election, Obama must keep the US-Russian relations "restart" the hard-won achievements, because this is the diplomatic sphere, in that term one of the few "political achievements". However, if US-Russian relations do not "fall short", Obama must treat each other good words with Putin. Putin's presidential election win, but the hardships of his own heart knows best. Better development of national economy in the coming term, the country's economic development and create a more favorable external environment, which Putin can not avoid relations with the U.S.. Shouting match with the Americans can "vent", but name calling does not solve the problem, Putin will "homeopathic" the tone of Russian policy towards America from the "election period" to adjust to "normal period", that is, as long as Americans do not to "Birentaishen" not take the initiative with the United States competing with children ".

U.S. woman driving texting stuffed a fatal car crash jailed

Texting a woman in California, USA using a mobile phone while driving on the highway causing a fatal traffic accident, was sentenced to five years in prison.
ralph lauren
On October 24 last year, the 22-year-old Se Kuya ? the Peter ? Jones driving in Northern California, a highway driving, hit a 64-year-old Robert ? Wilson, Wilson fell from the motorcycle to the ground. Jones did not immediately stop the rescue, but fled the scene, causing Wilson was another car killed.
polo ralph laurens
The crash occurs, Jones is using mobile phone text messaging.

Sacramento, California Superior Court Judge Lawrence ? Brown today announced the judgment of Jones, she served five years.
www.polo-ralphlaurens.net
Brown said that in recent years, serious accidents caused by drivers texting. Jones' case still for those who drive the mass use of mobile phones is a good warning to the defendant to pay the price for myself rash and reckless behavior.

Not all drivers to send text messages to cause others killed or injured by a similar punishment.
GHD
Last May, the 18-year-old female student of the California State University Sonoma Campus Caitlin ? Duna Wei at the intersection killed a 2-year-old girl Carly ? Murray, girl's Chinese mother was seriously injured. Duna Wei is driving texting.

In November, the Duna Wei was sentenced to five days in jail, 115 days electronic monitoring outside the prison, 200 hours community service.
Lisseur Ghd
The United States currently has 35 state bans texting, California, New York, 10 states prohibit driving call.
www.lisseurghdfrance.net
Young people driving the use of mobile phones is much higher than drivers of other ages. A Pew survey shows that 44% of young people driving and talking on the phone, send text messages.

German research shows that children's food is sweet and unh

Lisseur GhdGermany, a consumer rights organization "Food Watch" by the thousands of children's food market research, the final draw conclusions: Currently available on the market specifically for children to create the food is not conducive to a balanced diet of children, on the contrary will train children's poor eating habits.
ralph lauren
The period April 2011 to January 2012, "Food Watch" of 1514 kinds of food for children were tested. The consumer rights organization pointed out that the consumption of children's food is basically impossible to achieve a balanced diet, these foods most of the sweet side, but also unhealthy.
polo ralph laurens
Children's food production companies hope children early exposure to unhealthy junk food, the reason is simple: operate fruits, vegetables benefited less, and the operation of junk food and soft drinks profit quite good. Many companies are claiming is committed to promoting a balanced diet of children's food, but in fact for profit purposes, but then these enterprises as possible to be more interested in selling unhealthy food. Fruits and vegetables less than 5% profit margin, sweets, drinks and snacks can bring more than 15% of the profit margin. Such high profits, one of the reasons is that the production of these food additives such as spices, starch, and so is relatively cheap. Such as snacks, although unhealthy, but people can eat at any time, in between the two meals.
www.polo-ralphlaurens.net
"Food Watch" also believes that the proliferation of unhealthy food for children also bear some responsibility. Government should strive to create a children's food advertising environment for primary schools and kindergartens. In addition, federal, state and local governments should try to avoid cooperation with the food-processing enterprises.
GHD
Consumer interest groups "Food Watch" supported by the federal Food, Agriculture and Consumer Protection Consumer Protection Association in accordance with the recommended dietary nutrition pyramid food directory were also studied. The results showed that 73.3% of the catalog of children's food is sugar and fat food, is included in the Red List. Under normal circumstances, the daily dietary intake of such foods children should not exceed the amount of their hand to crawl. Only 12.4 percent of the food is included in the green list of these foods is recommended should eat, such as various forms of processed fruits, like applesauce, dried fruits, tomato sauce or fruit juice and fruit juice mixed www.lisseurghdfrance.net
